page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: INTRODUCTION Sabden and the surrounding area of our D-Block is basically an agricultural area.It is situated 5 miles north-west of Burnley and nestles quietly on the slopes of Pendle Hill.This Hill dominates the landscape for many miles and is associated with many supernatural superstitions,the main one being the Pendle Witches.It is an area of small close knit communities which are aggressively independent of one another and who take a pride in their own traditions.People who are born in our area tend to remain there most of their lives.There has been a tendency over the past 20 years for 'outsiders' to move in attracted by the beautiful scenery,and the relative isolation,which allows easy commuting to the towns close by.
